blogPost.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
blogPost.body: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
blogPost.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center
blogPost.author: Sandeep Dinesh

localize.description: Kbee为你，你的团队，或你的客户将Google Drive文件夹转化为一个可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 将Google Drive变成wiki或帮助中心。

localize.description: Kbee爲你，你的團隊，或你的客戶將Google Drive文件夾轉化爲一個可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 將Google Drive變成wiki或幫助中心。

previous.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
previous.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes

localize.description: 专注于重要的事情，从小任务到人生目标。- 把时间花在做事情和实现目标上 不要再浪费时间去分类或衡量生产力了 简约而愉悦的设计。无需注册。没有广告。不收集数据。
localize.tagline: 为你的待办事项和笔记而设计的极简主义应用。

localize.description: 專注於重要的事情，從小任務到人生目標。- 把時間花在做事情和實現目標上 不要再浪費時間去分類或衡量生產力了 簡約而愉悅的設計。無需註冊。沒有廣告。不收集數據。
localize.tagline: 爲你的待辦事項和筆記而設計的極簡主義應用。

next.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
next.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving

localize.description: 我们为人们创造了一种将运动和乐趣相结合的激励方式。这是一个增强现实游戏库。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯卧撑去玩游戏。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上赢得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

localize.description: 我們爲人們創造了一種將運動和樂趣相結合的激勵方式。這是一個增強現實遊戲庫。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯臥撐去玩遊戲。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上贏得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增強現實遊戲讓你動起來
